title: Episode 817 - Special Guest Malcolm Gladwell
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Malcolm Gladwell to discuss his new book “The Bomber Mafia” on Air Force Generals Curtin LeMay and Heywood Hansell and how they helped win World War 2 despite the impossible odds stacked against them — plus M...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Malcolm Gladwell to discuss his new book “The Bomber Mafia” on Air Force Generals Curtin LeMay and Heywood Hansell and how they helped win World War 2 despite the impossible odds stacked against them — plus Malcolm gives his thoughts on the NFL, the future of print and audio media (and entertainment in general), and what he thinks the best definition of “genius” is.
